General.Name: Nanotech Indonesia Global Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Nanotech Indonesia Global Tbk, a tech company, engages in the field of research and development (R&D)-based and science and technology-based services, materials engineering, and nanotechnology. The company operates in the materials, health, aquaculture, inspection, property, and education businesses. It provides R&D, engineering, supplier services equipment and materials nano, and human resource capacity building services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in South Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Nanotech Indonesia Global Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Nanotech Investama Sedaya.
